Package net.sourceforge.metrics.builder

Interface Summary
IMetricsProgressListener  
 

Class Summary
MetricsBuilder builder to (re)calculate metrics for modified java resources.
MetricsBuilder.AddedCommand AddedCommand calculates the metrics for a new/moved resource
MetricsBuilder.CalculatorThread  
MetricsBuilder.ChangedCommand ChangedCommand removes cached metricas and recalculates them
MetricsBuilder.Command Base class for the commands
MetricsBuilder.Queue  
MetricsBuilder.RemovedCommand RemovedCommand removes the cached metrics
MetricsNature Metrics Nature adds/removes Metrics builder to a project
ProgressQueue Decouples the calculation thread from the others.
Semaphore Simple counting semaphore for queue blocking
